title: Killing Floor 2
notes: Works fine ingame at high settings. (no graphics glitches) Some control glitches. (using KDE) Serverbrowser may crash the game. No PhysX options, understandably. Level progress isn't synced to Windows, have to start all over.

title: Killing Floor 2
notes: Game runs with launch options "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%". Texture issues, FPS in the low 20s.

notes: Appears the splash, but after it crashes.

title: Killing Floor 2
notes: Mouse is twitchy, seems to hit invisible edges making aiming very difficult, FPS appears to be high but feels very stuttery.

title: Killing Floor 2
notes: The game works but crashed randomly. XWayland has a bug of not showing fullscreen Vulkan games, you need to set it to window mode.

title: Killing Floor 2
notes:
Game runs with launch options "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%".
Various texture / rendering issues, see https://screens.totally.rip/2018/08/5b832da27da32.png https://screens.totally.rip/2018/08/5b832daf25d32.png
Steady 50 FPS on High Settings. Game progress does not appear to sync.

title: Killing Floor 2
notes: The game works very well with this setup, but browsing servers although works, as you select one or try to join to one, the game immediately crashes. Matchmaking for on-line games works. As does off-line solo mode

title: Killing Floor 2
notes: Performance is near native and everything works except eperience progress doesn't save

notes: Server browser crashes the game. There are random crashes when playing. Other than that the game runs very smooth at high settings, no missing textures or anything.

title: Killing Floor 2
notes: Game showed high fps (80-100) with no graphical glitches, but it always felt stuttery. All progress was not carried over, all perks appear lvl 0 for some reason.

title: Killing Floor 2
notes:
1. For even load the game, you have to tweak game launch options (right click on the game in library -> properties -> set launch options) and write there "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" without quotes.
2. Exps are not loaded nor saved.
3. Graphical glitches make the game almost unplayable. Tried low to high settings with no difference.

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX Vega (VEGA10, DRM 3.23.0, 4.15.0-33-generic, LLVM 8.0.0)
notes: Did not test gameplay, but it completely ruins your stats. Perks reset to level 0, and you have to reset stats in console with "resetstats steamname", and start it all over again.

notes:
Multiplayer doesn't seems to work.
Solo offline mode works perfectly.
title: Killing Floor 2

notes: Crashes after a few minutes, corrupts your existing steamcloud save file.
title: Killing Floor 2

notes: High framerate, but stutters constantly. There is no correlation between graphical settings and the stuttering, it does it on High and Low settings.
title: Killing Floor 2

notes:
Solo offline and online multiplayer works.
Connecting to LAN server crashes the game.
Performance is pretty good.
title: Killing Floor 2

notes: using wineD3D11 causes intense graphical glitches, can use `-dx10` launch option to run the game normally with massively reduced framerate. Crashes on server browser, offline works fine.
title: Killing Floor 2

notes: Works, playable, but is kinda stuttery, and is far from smooth.
title: Killing Floor 2

notes: Performs significantly worse than it does on Windows and stutters constantly, but is still playable. Selecting a server on the server browser crashes the game, but multiplayer is still possible through matchmaking. Singleplayer works fine.

notes: Bugsplat at Startup

notes: Works perfectly even in online mode (if not using the server browser)
title: Killing Floor 2

notes: Ignore my last report, managed to get it work, but it used more memory then must. I don't see any shuttering, game seems smooth to me, but you can't use DX11 because of glitches. Use DX10 mode is lowering fps (with pba patches game run smooth).

title: Killing Floor 2

notes:
First of all: switching from Win to Linux broke my stats/perks, but i could fix it with deleting the steamcloudfile - after that all progress was restored!

I didn't do any tweaks (D3d11), because on my system they broke the game entirely. Runs "out of the box" but with poor performance (lagging/fps drops, especially when many things happen on the screen). Serverbrowser doesn't work, but you can que up to find games automatically.
It runs without other issues and you CAN play. Not so much fun with the fpsdrops tho...
title: Killing Floor 2

notes: Game is playable without issue, but when clicking on game in game browser it crashes. Automatic search works.
title: Killing Floor 2
